name: Hot Coffee
description: Indulge in the timeless essence of concentrated coffee at SaborCup, where every sip tells a story of rich Hispanic heritage and passion for the perfect brew.

name: Cold Coffee
description: Experience the refreshing allure of chilled coffee over ice at SaborCup, a haven where tradition meets innovation, offering a delightful escape from the ordinary.

name: Hot Tea
description: Delight in the aromatic embrace of black tea infused with bergamot, a timeless blend that captures the essence of warmth and hospitality at SaborCup, a celebration of Hispanic culture and flavors.

name: Iced Tea
description: Cool down with the chilled allure of black or herbal tea over ice at SaborCup, a tranquil oasis where the crisp refreshment of Hispanic-inspired iced beverages awaits.

name: Lemonade
description: Quench your thirst with the invigorating fusion of green tea, peach syrup, and lemonade at SaborCup, where every sip is a vibrant homage to the refreshing zest of Hispanic-inspired beverages.

name: Bakery
description: Treat yourself to the irresistible charm of traditional Mexican sweet bread with a crunchy topping at SaborCup, where each bite is a journey through the comforting flavors of Hispanic baking traditions.
